weight: Approx. 181 g (including battery/batteries and memory card)
zoom: Optical 5x ZoomPlus 9x Digital Approx. 4x (with Digital Tele-Converter Approx. 1.4x or 1.8x¹) Combined Approx. 20x
construction: 7 elements in 6 groups (1 double-sided aspherical lens, 1 double-sided aspherical UA lens and 1 single-sided aspherical lens)
